game.name: Bendy: Lone Wolf
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Bendy: Lone Wolf™ will tests your ability to survive against ever increasing odds. Monsters and obstacles emerge from every direction as you journey into the rubberhose halls of the world's most evil animation studio. Every day is a challenge.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Bendy: Lone Wolf™ will tests your ability to survive against ever increasing odds. Monsters and obstacles emerge from every direction as you journey into the rubberhose halls of the world's most evil animation studio. Every day is a challenge.

reviewHighlights.text: Gameplay loop is fun and the enemies/ink demon keep the atmosphere alive. Really good Bendy spinoff, though the gameplay can still get very repetitive...
Ngl, Boris and the Dark Survival was a decent game, but Bendy: Lone Wolf is far better, as it improved the gameplay (and graphics too), hell, it even...
